title: She Makes Me (Stormtrooper in Stilettoes)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I love, she makes me
She is my heart
She is my love
She is my love
[Verse 2]
I know, I'm jealous of her
She makes me need
She is my love
She is my love
[Bridge]
Who knows who she'll make me
As I lie in her cocoon
But the world will surely heal my ills
I'm warm and terrified
She makes me so
[Verse 3]
I know the day I leave her
I'll love her still
She is my love
She is my love
[Bridge]
Who knows where my dreams will end
I'll follow as they grow
But the world will know
How long I'll take
And if I'm very slow
She makes me so

[Outro]
She is my love
She is my love
[Solo]
[Ambulance siren]
